Successfully implemented complete shareable link system for client WhatsApp onboarding.

## Implementation Summary
- **Database**: ShareToken model with Prisma migration applied
- **Backend**: 4 API endpoints (generate, validate, generateQR, checkStatus)
- **Frontend**: Client guidance page + ShareModal + InstanceCard integration
- **Security**: UUID tokens, expiration checks, usage tracking, cascade delete

## Key Features
- Token-based secure sharing (24h expiration default)
- Professional client guidance page with QR code
- Real-time connection status polling
- Step-by-step WhatsApp connection instructions
- Copy/share functionality in admin modal
- Mobile-responsive design

## Files Created
- share.interfaces.ts, share.repository.ts, share.controller.ts
- /connect/[token]/page.tsx - Client guidance page
- share-modal.tsx - Admin share modal
- Prisma migration for ShareToken model

## Integration Points
- Registered in igniter.router.ts
- Added to InstanceCard dropdown menu
- Integrated in main dashboard page

## Next Steps
- Manual testing of complete flow
- Fix any runtime issues
- User acceptance testing
